components.description:
A curved arrow pointing down.

Generally used to highlight a piece of content placed below where this emoji can be used. This content could be a picture, a website link, or a different piece of text,
components.title: Arrow Pointing Rightwards Then Curving Downwards

description:
A curved arrow pointing down.

Generally used to highlight a piece of content placed below where this emoji can be used. This content could be a picture, a website link, or a different piece of text,
title: Arrow Pointing Rightwards Then Curving Downwards

version.description:
The following characters we added to Unicode in 2002, with many given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

Those given emoji presentation status by Unicode were part of Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Arrows B -> Miscellaneous curved arrows
emoji_net_data.definition: A curved arrow pointing down. Right Arrow Curving Down was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 under the name “Arrow Pointing Rightwards http://emojipedia.org/arrow-pointing-rightwards-then-curving-downwards/
emoji_net_data.name: right arrow curving down

bn:00101753a: From the higher end to the lower of.
Extending or moving from a higher to a lower place
From one end to another; especially, from a higher end to a lower.

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

bn:00027355n: The management or direction of the affairs of a public or private office, business or organization.
Government, control, superintendence, physical or manual handling or guidance; act of managing by direction or regulation, or administration, as management of family, or of household, etc.
